Tolwaz Images CDN - Demo Page

This page demonstrates how to use the Tolwaz Images CDN powered by jsDelivr.

Logo Usage

https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/Salman-41/tolwaz-images@latest/dist/images/logos/logo.png

Add your logo files to the logos directory and reference them using the URL pattern above.

Banner Usage

https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/Salman-41/tolwaz-images@latest/dist/images/banners/hero-banner.jpg

Upload banner images to the banners directory for marketing materials.

Product Images

https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/Salman-41/tolwaz-images@latest/dist/images/products/product-001.jpg

Store product images in the products directory with organized naming.

Icons

https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/Salman-41/tolwaz-images@latest/dist/images/icons/home.svg

Use the icons directory for UI icons and symbols.

UI Elements

https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/Salman-41/tolwaz-images@latest/dist/images/ui/button-bg.png

Store UI elements and design assets in the ui directory.

Getting Started

  1. Add your images to the appropriate directories in dist/images/
  2. Commit and push your changes
  3. Create a release tag for version control
  4. Use the jsDelivr CDN URLs in your website

Repository Structure

dist/images/
├── logos/          # Brand logos and identity assets
├── icons/          # UI icons and symbols  
├── banners/        # Marketing banners and hero images
├── products/       # Product images and galleries
└── ui/            # User interface elements

Note: Replace the example URLs above with your actual image filenames once you upload them to this repository.
